Title: Laborde, liberalism, and religion
Source: Crit. Rev. Int. Soc. Polit. Philos.
Abstract: © 2018, © 2018 Informa UK Limited, trading as Taylor & Francis Group.In this introduction, we provide a brief overview of the debate on religion in political philosophy. We present the main arguments defended by Cécile Laborde in Liberalism’s Religion and explain how these arguments contribute to the debate.
